channel.title: "Perfect Cb"
channel.description:
Just have a few questions about the combat system. Fooling around with rs2 servers lately (just playing them to get a feel for what players want) and I noticed that the combat system of the servers I have played are totally shit and don't replicate the current version of runescape at all.
Has somebody replicated the combat system enough to where it can seem real?

item.title: "Perfect Cb"
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:7, topic:387651”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=483445.msg3541531#msg3541531 date=1300907604]
I am going to work on a combat formula that mirriors runescape. OFC it will not be identical but still I can get it as close as possible. It just seems like private server combat formulas are wrecked.
[/quote]

If you get it to work are you going to sell/release it?[/quote]

Would probably most likely release it.

Read full topic

item.title: "Perfect Cb"
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

IlikeArrays:

I am talking about the probability of a “hit” and the value of the hit. Seems like private servers don’t take in consideration the players armour bonus.

i know right? im wanting it like that to but its hard to find people that know how though

Read full topic

item.title: "Perfect Cb"
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I haven’t played RuneScape in a long time. What features are you looking for? Correct timers, combat effects(poison, snare, etc), and things of the like?

Read full topic
